title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 76.9 - Stipulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 76.9 - Stipulations

State Regulations
(a) Hearings into findings of violations may be waived upon stipulation between the respondent and the department. (b) Stipulations shall comply with terms and conditions prescribed by the department, and may include assessment of a penalty not to exceed the maximum penalty assessable for each violation cited in the finding of violation. (c) The department inspector, in serving the finding of violation, shall be authorized to represent the department in explaining the options available to the respondent in answering the finding of violations, including the option for stipulation. (d) The tribunal or tribunal representative shall be authorized to offer a stipulation to the respondent. (e) Information concerning stipulations made under this section is subject to public release. Notes

76.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
